Name: Witching Hour
About the game: Every small town has its secrets, but some are worse than others... Witching Hour is a horror story that takes you out of your family home and across Hollow Hills to face its dark history of witchcraft. Your fate depends on making difficult choices, your relationship with your father and sister, and confrontations with the matriarch of the town’s affliction, Lucilia . As Above, So Below : Learn of the “other church” in town, with its members and location hidden to most locals. Hollow Hills : Explore locations like The Pasture , The Parish , Eastern Village , Greenwater Gardens , and more. Witching Hour : There’s no place like home, but be cautious to not wander your family house too much at night. Explore, discover, and survive: Explore a variety of grim locations with hidden clues and cryptic puzzles. Engage in frightening encounters with the witch Lucilia and her coven. Learn of black magick and witchcraft while the world starts to break around you. A cast of talented voice actors bring the dialogue and characters to life. Genre: Story-driven psychological horror that takes place over several months in your family home and surrounding area. From the creator of:
